entities.name: shell cottage
entities.description: The location where the scene is taking place. The text states "Shell Cottage" as the name of the location.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: A person who is present at Shell Cottage. Bill is described as filling goblets with wine and making toast.

entities.name: teddy remus lupin
entities.description: A person who is the subject of a toast. Lupin is described as a "great wizard in the making".

entities.name: dora
entities.description: A person whose resemblance to Teddy Remus Lupin is mentioned. Dora's name is mentioned as being compared to Lupin's appearance.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: A person who inquires about the resemblance between Teddy Remus Lupin and Dora. Fleur's name is mentioned as asking a question.

entities.name: andromeda
entities.description: A person whose opinion on Tonks's hair color change is mentioned. Andromeda's name is mentioned in the context of discussing hair color changes.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A person whose hair color change is mentioned by Andromeda. Tonks's name is mentioned as having a notable hair color change at birth.

relationships.description: Bill is located at Shell Cottage, where the scene is taking place. The text states "The wind buﬀeted the little cottage and the ﬁre leapt and crackled".
Bill makes a toast to Teddy Remus Lupin. The text states "To Teddy Remus Lupin," said Lupin, "a great wizard in the making!"
Fleur compares Dora's resemblance to Teddy Remus Lupin. The text states "’Oo does ’e look like?" Fleur inquired."
Andromeda mentions that Tonks's hair color change is similar to Teddy Remus Lupin's. The text states "Andromeda says Tonks’s hair started changing color the day that she was born."
